name: mirror-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user looses a
flash of energy from
its polished body.
It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.
